New Shaper

Viridian, the Abyssal

Viridian, the Abyssal
Viridian is a melee, physical damage Assassin who focuses solely on doing massive damage to a single target. Viridian is suited both to the Gladiator and Hunter roles, always performing best when paired with (or ganking the lane of) Shapers who can help set up his massive burst combo. Viridian's core kit allows him to dominate duels against almost any target, as well as has enough mobility and damage to corner and assassinate targets in a hectic teamfight. Viridian's core combo can be one of the most devastating in the game, but requires tricky set up that can be interrupted by mobile targets or enemy crowd control - use Viridian's ultimate and mobility wisely to counter these strategies.

Passive - Rage Shaper - Adrenal Glands - Viridian uses Rage to cast his abilities. Viridian is healed whenever his Rage drains or is consumed.
Q - Knife Toss - Viridian throws a knife at the closest target prioritizing Shapers, dealing damage and causing them to take increased damage from Viridian.
W - Surge - Viridian dashes in target direction, then gains increased movespeed and damage on his next basic attack which allows Surge to be reactivated when used.
E - Heartstrike - Deals massive damage to target enemy based on his Rage. Viridian will remove any Knives in the target, returning them to his supply and allowing the target to be knifed again.
R - Deep Rising - Viridian summons a giant Cetan Whale in target direction, impaling the first shaper struck and dragging them along with him. Any other shapers hit get knocked away.
Balance and Tuning
Shapers

• Whirling Strike (Q)
    • Fixed a bug that would occasionally allow multiple casts of this ability if activated several times within a short period of time.

• Forgotten Tombs (Q)
    • The cooldown of this ability has been increased to 13/12.5/12/11.5/11, up from 12/11.5/11/10.5/10.
  • Death Fog
    • Fixed a bug where if this ability was interrupted during one of its activations, the rest of the activations would be lost.

• Reconfigure (Q)
    • The non-Shaper damage cap on this ability has been reduced to 30/65/100/135/170, down from 50/90/130/170/210.
    • The melee form damage based on missing Health now gains 2.5% damage based on missing health per 100 Power, down from 4% per 100 power.
  • Access Memory (W)
    • The melee form damage vs non-Shapers on this ability has been reduced to 50/90/130/170/210, down from 60/100/140/180/220.
    • The melee form damage vs Shapers on this ability has been reduced to 75/135/195/255/315, down from 90/150/210/270/330.
    • The ranged form damage of this ability has been increased to 120/170/220/270/320, up from 100/150/200/250/300.
  • Final Protocol (R)
    • The damage per missile on this ability has been increased to 75/120/165, up from 45/70/95.
    • Consecutive hits against the same target now deal 50% reduced damage.

• Wrath (R)
    • Fixed a bug that was allowing the Fear component of this ability to affect Shapers under the influence of disable immunity effects, such as Blitz.

• Nightstrike (Q)
    • The damage of this ability has been reduced to 60/105/150/195/240, down from 65/110/155/200/245.
  • Nox Aeterna (R)
    • Reduced the reactivation cooldown of this ability to 0.75 seconds, down from 1 second.
    • The time you have to reactivate this ability from the previous cast has been increased to 6 seconds, up from 5.
    • The range of this ability has been increased to 475, up from 425.
    • Fixed a bug where if this ability was interrupted during one of its activations, the rest of the activations would be lost.

• Captivate (Q)
    • The cooldown of this ability has been reduced to 11/10/9/8/7, down from 12/11/10/9/8.
  • Endless Delights (E)
    • The cooldown of this ability has been reduced to 11/10/9/8/7, down from 12/11/10/9/8.

• Thrill of the Hunt (W)
    • Fixed a bug where Kensu would sometimes hit a wall instead of correctly dashing over it.
    • Fixed a bug where this ability was resetting inconsistently when reset via Defiance's passive ability Cornered Beast.

• Spite (Q)
    • The damage of this ability has been reduced to 50/95/140/185/230, down from 55/100/145/190/235.
Updated auto attack animations.

• Pure Blood (W)
    • The blood orbs generated by this ability will now generate 1% faster per 1% cooldown reduction that Viyana has.

• Devour (E)
    • This ability now has a 0.15 second cast time.
    • The damage of this ability has been reduced to 50/105/150/195/240, down from 65/110/155/200/245.

• Chains of Fate (Q)
    • The cooldown of this ability has been reduced to 13/12/11/10/9, down from 15/14/13/12/11.

  • Fixed a filtering issue for Petrus and Ashabel.

General

  • Your Loadout selection will now be saved on a per Shaper basis.
  • The tooltip for Fears will now show the appropriate duration when being reduced by disable reductions, such as Tenacity.
  • Fixed a bug where if you had multiple sources of percentage Power increased it would result in significantly higher Power values than intended.
